rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: SLA - Case Priority High/Critical & Status InProcess/Escalated

Flow.description: SE-56 - To define escalation paths within my SLA So that I can insure that the appropriate resources are notified when an SLA at risk.
Flow.label: HRCSVC Case SLA Escalations
